price: Lalle Mũ, Mun sanya ƙuƙumma a cikin wuyõyinsu, sa'an nan sũ (ƙuƙumman sun kai) har zuwa ga haɓõɓinsu, sabõda haka, sũ banƙararru ne.
arabic: إِنَّا جَعَلۡنَا فِيٓ أَعۡنَٰقِهِمۡ أَغۡلَٰلٗا فَهِيَ إِلَى ٱلۡأَذۡقَانِ فَهُم مُّقۡمَحُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: innā jaʿalnā fī aʿnāqihim aghlālan fahiya ilā al-adhqāni fahum muq'maḥūna
